name: Olivia
text:
She has a great personality and loves 
traveling around the world.

name: Olivia
text:
Use the A key and D keys to move 
clockwise or counterclockwise.

name: Olivia
text:
Just be careful when you go upside down, 
things might get confusing.

name: Olivia
text: Just don't touch the Megabit to win.

name: Olivia
text:
Let me know when you are ready to move on 
to the next tutorial.
